scripts.build:web: cd apps/web && BUN_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build:core: cd packages/core && BUN_ENV=production bun run build && cd ../ui && BUN_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build:pyboard: cd packages/device-pyboard && BUN_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build:code: cd packages/code-editor && BUN_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build:blocks: cd packages/blocks-editor && BUN_ENV=production bun run build && cd ../blocks-player && BUN_ENV=production bun run build
scripts.build:workspace-blocks: bun run build:core && bun run build:pyboard && bun run build:blocks && cd packages/workspace-blocks && BUN_ENV=production bun run build
